thought: To craft a warped_button, I need to place the warped_planks from slot 41 into the crafting grid. I will start by placing it into slot 1.
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: The warped_button has now been crafted, so I will move it to an empty slot (eg., 11) in my inventory.
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
